name: teenager
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a young person between 13 and 19 years old: The magazine is aimed at teenagers and young adults. Compare
adolescent noun
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a bit of a rebel when he was a teenager and dyed his hair pink and had his nose pierced.As a teenager, Clare was always getting on the wrong side of her mother.Many parents find it hard to relate to their children when they are teenagers.He found it very hard teaching a class full of stroppy teenagers.It's pathetic to see 50-year-old rock stars prancing around on stage as if they were still teenagers.
